languages.text: "Экая пичуга! Каждому охота в шкуре эттфатера родиться, да бремя {rt_mf|его|ее} не многим по плечу. Ступай, куда шла, не до тебя нынче".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Экая пичуга! Каждому охота в шкуре эттфатер{mf|а|} родиться, да бремя {mf|его|ее} не многим по плечу. Ступай, куда шла, не до тебя нынче".
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Strange little bird! Everyone wishes to wear the Aett-Vater's mantle, but few could bear its weight. Go and tell your tales elsewhere."
languages.original_text: "Экая пичуга! Каждому охота в шкуре эттфатера родиться, да бремя {rt_mf|его|ее} не многим по плечу. Ступай, куда шла, не до тебя нынче".

traits.locale_text: "Strange little bird! Everyone wishes to walk in the Aett-Vater's shoes, but few could shoulder {rt_mf|his|her} burden. Go and tell your tales elsewhere."
"Strange little bird! Everyone wishes to walk in the Aett-Vater's shoes, but few could shoulder {rt_mf|his|her} burden. Go and tell your tales elsewhere."
"Strange little bird! Everyone wishes to walk in the Aett-Vater's shoes, but few could shoulder {rt_mf|his|her} burden. Go and tell your tales elsewhere."
"Strange little bird! Everyone wishes to wear the Aett-Vater's mantle, but few could bear its weight. Go and tell your tales elsewhere."
"Strange little bird! Everyone wishes to wear the Aett-Vater's mantle, but few could bear its weight. Go and tell your tales elsewhere."

languages.text: “你这只古怪的小鸟！每个人都渴望继承狼领的衣钵，但很少有人能肩负它的重量，还是去别地方讲你的童话故事吧。”
languages.original_text: "Strange little bird! Everyone wishes to wear the Aett-Vater's mantle, but few could bear its weight. Go and tell your tales elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: “你这只古怪的小鸟！每个人都渴望继承狼领的衣钵，但很少有人能肩负它的重量，还是去别地方讲你的童话故事吧。”

languages.text: «¡Extraño pajarillo! Todos quieren vestir el manto {rt_mf|del|de la} Aett-Vater, mas pocos serían capaces de soportar su peso. Vete a otro sitio a contar tus mentiras».
languages.original_text: "Strange little bird! Everyone wishes to wear the Aett-Vater's mantle, but few could bear its weight. Go and tell your tales elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: «¡Extraño pajarillo! Todos quieren vestir el manto {mf|del|de la} Aett-Vater, mas pocos serían capaces de soportar su peso. Vete a otro sitio a contar tus mentiras».

languages.text: "Garip küçük kuş! Herkes Aett-Vater'ın pelerinini giymek ister ama pek azı ağırlığını taşıyabilir. Masallarını başkalarına anlat."
languages.original_text: "Strange little bird! Everyone wishes to wear the Aett-Vater's mantle, but few could bear its weight. Go and tell your tales elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: "Garip küçük kuş! Herkes Aett-Vater'ın pelerinini giymek ister ama pek azı ağırlığını taşıyabilir. Masallarını başkalarına anlat."

languages.text: 「奇妙な小鳥どもよ！アエット＝ヴァテルのマントを着ることを誰もが望んでいるが、その重さに耐えられる者はほとんどいない。どこか他の場所に行って、お前の話を伝えろ」
languages.original_text: "Strange little bird! Everyone wishes to wear the Aett-Vater's mantle, but few could bear its weight. Go and tell your tales elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: 「奇妙な小鳥どもよ！アエット＝ヴァテルのマントを着ることを誰もが望んでいるが、その重さに耐えられる者はほとんどいない。どこか他の場所に行って、お前の話を伝えろ」

languages.text: « Quel drôle de petit oiseau ! Tout le monde rêve de porter le manteau de l'aett-vater, mais rares sont ceux capables d'en supporter le poids. Allez donc raconter vos sornettes ailleurs. »
languages.original_text: "Strange little bird! Everyone wishes to wear the Aett-Vater's mantle, but few could bear its weight. Go and tell your tales elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: « Quel drôle de petit oiseau ! Tout le monde rêve de porter le manteau de l'aett-vater, mais rares sont ceux capables d'en supporter le poids. Allez donc raconter vos sornettes ailleurs. »

languages.text: "Sonderbarer kleiner Vogel! Jeder will den Mantel des Aett-Vaters tragen, doch kaum jemand könnte sein Gewicht schultern. Geht und erzählt Eure Geschichten woanders."
languages.original_text: "Strange little bird! Everyone wishes to wear the Aett-Vater's mantle, but few could bear its weight. Go and tell your tales elsewhere."

traits.locale_text: "Sonderbarer kleiner Vogel! Jeder will den Mantel des Aett-Vaters tragen, doch kaum jemand könnte sein Gewicht schultern. Geht und erzählt Eure Geschichten woanders."
